metadata.title: CVE-2021-22248 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper authorization on the pipelines page in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions since 13.12 allowed unauthorized users to view some pipelineinformation for public projects that have access to pipelines restricted tomembers only

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
